long_description: With a 10 in. inseam for plenty of coverage, the men's Arc'teryx Incendo Long Shorts offer quick-drying fabric and a smooth fit for great performance on your run. Fabric is incredibly lightweight, wicks moisture, dries quickly and incorporates just a bit stretch for ease of movement. Durable water repellent finish sheds light moisture and splashes and reduces moisture absorption so fabric stays dry. Shorts help protect from UV light with a UPF rating of 50+. Discreet rear stash pocket makes it easy to store energy food or a media player and includes a port for earphones. Elastic waistband has a drawstring for a personalized fit. The men's Arc'teryx Incendo Long Shorts feature reflective highlights to increase your visibility in low light.
short_description: With a 10 in. inseam for plenty of coverage, the men's Arc'teryx Incendo Long Shorts offer quick-drying fabric and a smooth fit for great performance on your run.
